alert.note: Alert for Custer; Dewey (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 5:31PM CDT until May 31 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CUSTER AND SOUTHEASTERN DEWEY COUNTIES... At 530 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Custer City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Weatherford, Thomas, Arapaho, Custer City, Butler and Fay. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
